contextId.information: Paul speaks of sinners as if they were physically dirty. AT: "the one who is morally defiled and who does not believe cannot be pure" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
contextId.quote: to those who are stained and unbelieving, nothing is pure

selections.text: kwa wote walio wachafu na wasioamini, hakuna kilicho safi
